category.name: Product Structure.Design Context.Performance Tuning
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_allow_longer_occnote_text_length
preference.preference_description: Activates the persistence of occurrence note search criteria if their text is longer than 32 characters. For the customers who do not use multi-site, the preference should be set to "true". For the customers who have upgraded all their sites (involving Import/Export) to TC11.4 or higher, the preference can be set to "true". The default value is "false" which means that occurrence note search criteria should be less than 32 characters.
